text: Outside Providence is a 1999 American teen comedy movie directed by Michael Corrente and was based on the 1988 novel of the same name by Peter Farrelly. It stars Alec Baldwin, Amy Smart, Jon Abrahams, Shawn Hatosy, Jesse Leach, George Wendt, Mike Cerrone, Jonathan Brandis and Richard Jenkins. It was distributed by Miramax Films. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1999 comedy movies Category:1990s teen comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Michael Corrente Category:Movies set in the 1970s Category:Movies set in Rhode Island Category:Movies set in Connecticut
title: Outside Providence (movie)
